### Live Webinar Date: 5/25/2022 @10am EST

----

In the webinar you will learn:

* Basic R commands
* PK data overview
    * Importing/exporting different file types e.g., `csv`, `xls`, `txt`
    * [`RsNLME`](https://certara.github.io/R-RsNLME/) data structure
* Data manipulation with [`dplyr`](https://dplyr.tidyverse.org/)
* Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA) with [`ggplot2`](https://ggplot2.tidyverse.org/)
* Descriptive statistics and table generation with [`gtsummary`](https://www.danieldsjoberg.com/gtsummary/) and [`flextable`](https://davidgohel.github.io/flextable/)
* Best practices for writing R template scripts
